mapper.select: select * from ml_imei_phone_log u where u.imei=#{imei} ;
mapper.insert: insert ignore into ml_imei_phone_log (imei , phone , count , day) values(#{imei}, #{phone} , #{count},#{day}) ON DUPLICATE KEY select 1;
mapper.update: update ml_imei_phone_log set count=0 , day=#{day},phone=#{phone} where imei = #{imei} ;
update ml_imei_phone_log set count=count+1 ,phone=#{phone} where imei = #{imei} ;
